Package cea.federated.server.grpc_server

Class ClientProxyGRPC

java.lang.Object
cea.federated.server.grpc_server.ClientProxyGRPC
public class ClientProxyGRPC extends Object
Implementation of the gRPC clients proxies. Clients proxies are defined at the server level as abstract clients with which the server can interact. It can send them requests, receive results from them or disconnect them from the network. Each client proxy represents one single client that could be solicited by the server during the different phases.

  • Field Details

    • logger

      public final org.apache.log4j.Logger logger
      Logger of the client proxy.

    • id

      public final Integer id
      Identifier of the client proxy.

    • is_alive

      public boolean is_alive
      Boolean that determines if the client is connected or not. (default=true)

    • is_passive

      public boolean is_passive
      Boolean that determines if the client is passive or not. (default=false, but the boolean will be updated directly once the client connection request has been processed.)

    • queue_server_message

      public Queue<ServerMessage> queue_server_message
      Queue of the messages that coming from the server and need to be sent to the client.

    • queue_client_message

      public Queue<ClientMessage> queue_client_message
      Queue of the messages that coming from the client and need to be processed by the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientProxyGRPC

      public ClientProxyGRPC(Integer id)
      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of the client.

  • Method Details

    • send_init_request

      public void send_init_request()
      Creates and adds a model initialisation request to the server messages queue.

    • send_fit_request

      public void send_fit_request(String server_parameters)
      Creates and adds a model fitting request to the server messages queue.
      Parameters:
      server_parameters - Model parameters that will be sent to the client for an ML model fitting process.

    • send_evaluate_request

      public void send_evaluate_request(String server_parameters)
      Creates and adds a model evaluation request to the server messages queue.
      Parameters:
      server_parameters - Model parameters that will be sent to the client for an ML model evaluation process.

    • send_model_parameters

      public void send_model_parameters(String server_parameters)
      Creates and adds a message with the server model parameters to the server messages queue. It permits to send the server model parameters without requesting any other actions (used especially for the 'OfflineClient's).
      Parameters:
      server_parameters - Model parameters that will be sent to the client.

    • send_disconnection_request

      public void send_disconnection_request()
      Creates and adds a disconnection request to the server messages queue.

    • receive_init_response

      public String receive_init_response() throws Exception
      Receives and processes the initialisation response that coming from the client.
      Returns:
      Client model parameters that have been initialized.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an errors happens during the processing of the message.

    • receive_fit_response

      public String receive_fit_response() throws Exception
      Receives and processes the fitting response that coming from the client.
      Returns:
      Client model parameters that have been updated.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an errors happens during the processing of the message.

    • receive_evaluate_response

      public double receive_evaluate_response() throws Exception
      Receives and processes the evaluation response that coming from the client. For the moment, the loss is the only one metric that is returned by the evaluation step, but it will soon be extended to others.
      Returns:
      Loss information that have been generated during the evaluation step.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an errors happens during the processing of the message.

    • receive_model_parameters_confirmation

      public void receive_model_parameters_confirmation() throws Exception
      Receives and processes the acknowledgement of receipt of the model parameters that coming for the client.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an errors happens during the processing of the message.

    • wait_for_alert

      public void wait_for_alert() throws InterruptedException
      Method used in the participateToNetwork() method of the ServerGRPC file. Permits to pause the client communication process to ensure the synchronization of all clients by waiting the next server request.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - In case of interruption.

    • send_alert

      public void send_alert()
      Unblocks the wait_for_alert() method when the new server request has finished being set up. It will also be called when the communication is completed or when an error happened to unblock and end the process.
